sense.def:
A practice
je nekaj, kar ljudje ponavadi delajo.

seg.quote: Benn began the practice of holding regular meetings.
...the ancient Japanese practice of binding the feet from birth.

sense.def:
The practice of someone's religion
so dejavnosti, ki jih nekdo opravlja kot del svoje vere.

Practice
je redno urjenje v nečem.

seg.quote: I help them with their music practice.
Skating's just a matter of practice.

sense.def:
A doctor's or lawyer's practice
je posel zdravnika ali odvetnika; pogosto ga deli z drugimi zdravniki ali odvetniki.

To put an idea or method into practice
pomeni konkretno uporabiti neko zamisel ali postopek.

seg.quote: He had not yet attempted to put his principles into practice.
I'm not sure how effective these methods will be when put into practice.

sense.def:
Kar se zgodi
in practice
, se resnično zgodi, v nasprotju s predvidevanji o tem, kaj naj bi se zgodilo.

seg.quote: In practice, he exerted little influence over the others.
What it means in practice is that he does twice the work for half the money.

sense.def:
Kdor je
out of practice at doing something
, zadnje čase nečesa ni delal.
